name: Super Orbit Ball
description:
Project was relocated due to unity compilation to WebGL taking waaay too long. Original submission to GMTK Game Jam : https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-2020/rate/699489

The game is out of control !

Follow the shiny ball that is not bounded by the rules of a single game, as it travels through many differents minigames. 

As difficulty scales, the challenge keeps increasing, requiring to master each and every minigame in order to reach high scores.

As of Sunday 12/07, our max score is but a humble 200, can you score higher ? Write your max score in the comments ! :-)
